message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to offer it to you for $13,000. This is a limited-time offer, so don't hesitate to let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $9,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $13,000 is a fair reflection of the product's value, I understand your budget constraints.  Would you consider $11,500?  I'm confident you'll find it's a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $10,250?
